ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Epic quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Haven t seen it drop on anyone but Silverwing. I m still wondering if there s a super-percussion instrument up there as well. Sartori{Legion} 57th Troubador
ygData.messageBody:
Haven't seen it drop on anyone but Silverwing. I'm still wondering if
there's a super-percussion instrument up there as well.

Sartori{Legion}
57th Troubador


>no lute has dropped the last 2 clearings. is it only a SW drop? but like
>you said, no real need with SSS though it's nice all the same. we did get
>a
>grey suede shoes and that 40/35 monk staff. we got a crown and 2 shrouds
>off PD, no robe yet though.
>
>Shada
